chapter.title: Traits
chapter.text: Traits are supernatural (supernormal or paranormal) capabilities. They are differentiated from Magic because they are singular in nature. For instance, a trait could be a specific power that a monster has, a specific power of a SuperHero. It can be the result of means magical, chemical, mutation, or some future technology.

The important part is that the power occurs singularly and uniquely and is not part of some larger system, i.e. Magic. Traits are generally bought at only one level, but can be purchased at higher levels, if it is pertinent. If a Trait needs points to power it, these are taken from the character's Mana Points.
Since many traits overlap magical spells, there is a specific trait designed for using abilities to some specific spell, this trait is called Spell Ability.
